name: Core_CanvasSizeChangedMessage_create
signature: Core_Result Core_CanvaSizeChangedMessage_create(Core_CanvaSizeChangedMessage** RETURN, Core_Real32 horizontalSize, Core_Real32 verticalSize);

parameters.name: horizontalSize
parameters.description: The horizontal size, in pixels, of the canvas.

parameters.name: verticalSize
parameters.description: The vertical size, in pixels, of the canvas.

success: @{code('*RETURN')} was assigned a pointer to the @{code('Core_CanvasSizeChangedMessage')} object.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
